title: Chroma-Jump
description: A fast-paced endless runner where platforms are Pink, Cyan, or Yellow — you must switch your character's color to match the platform or you'll fall right through!
long_description: Chroma-Jump is a reflex-based endless runner built entirely on the Canvas 2D API. Platforms are procedurally generated with random widths, gaps, and one of three neon colors. The player auto-runs forward and can jump (Space/Up). They must press 1/2/3 (or Q/W/E) to switch their character's color to match the incoming platform — a wrong-color collision phases through the platform for an instant game-over. AABB math drives all collision checks, and off-screen platforms are garbage-collected each frame for consistent performance.
author: saiusesgithub
